bug.author: tanmayb123
bug.summary: Segfault while training style transfer with 13 images
bug.description:
I'm working on training a style transfer algorithm, and followed the code from here: <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/style_transfer/>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/style_transfer/</denchmark-link>
But I get this error on a MacBook Pro: <denchmark-code>Using 'image' in style_dataset as feature column and using 'image' in content_dataset as feature column Setting max_iterations to be 4000
Segmentation fault: 11
Stack trace returned 10 entries: [bt] (0) 0 libmxnet.so 0x00000001143f92cf libmxnet.so + 58063 [bt] (1) 1 libmxnet.so 0x00000001156e0926 MXNDListFree + 3436870 [bt] (2) 2 libsystem_platform.dylib 0x00007fff5b28cc9d _sigtramp + 29 [bt] (3) 3 ??? 0x00000000000000fc 0x0 + 252 [bt] (4) 4 libunity_shared.dylib 0x000000010f4d8f3b png_combine_row + 2875 [bt] (5) 5 libunity_shared.dylib 0x000000010f4b4601 png_read_row + 1585 [bt] (6) 6 libunity_shared.dylib 0x000000010ec4caed turi::decode_png(char const*, unsigned long, char**, unsigned long&) + 317 [bt] (7) 7 libunity_shared.dylib 0x000000010f2e7bd5 turi::image_util_detail::decode_image_impl(turi::image_type&) + 117 [bt] (8) 8 libunity_shared.dylib 0x0000000110a80c8a turi::image_util::resize_image(turi::flexible_type const&, unsigned long, unsigned long, unsigned long, bool, int) + 154 [bt] (9) 9 libunity_shared.dylib 0x000000010f4fd98b void I'm running mxnet 1.1, and turicreate 5.0.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tanmayb123>@tanmayb123</denchmark-link> - how much RAM do you have? The Style Transfer Toolkit requires at least 4 GB of RAM.

What are the dimensions of your input images? The training is done with (256,256) size, so you might want to downsample your style and content images. Checkout <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.image_analysis.resize.html?highlight=resize#turicreate.image_analysis.resize>this</denchmark-link>
I'll try out the downsampling. I'm working with 4 GB of RAM on my GPU on a MacBook Pro.
Also, shouldn't that downsampling be done automatically by turi create?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tanmayb123>@tanmayb123</denchmark-link> Did the suggestions here solve your problem?
Closing this right now. Please re-open if we have a repro.
